meanings.definition: Of, containing, or constituting a reference.
meanings.sent1: The book had many referential notes in the margins.
meanings.sent2: She used referential language to explain the complex topic.
meanings.sent3: The referential cat kept pointing at the mouse toy, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was so referential, it seemed to come to life on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The referential map helped us navigate through the forest easily.

meanings.sent1: The referential document provided all the necessary information.
meanings.sent2: Their friendship was based on referential experiences from the past.
meanings.sent3: The referential joke made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was referential to the joy she felt inside.
meanings.sent5: The referential connection between the two ideas was clear in the presentation.
